plot: The year 1949 in Germany: a man wakes up in a cellar, next to him two dead bodies. He does not remember who he is or what happened. An investigator tries to find out if the man is suspect ...
plot_es: The year 1949 in Germany: a man wakes up in a cellar, next to him two dead bodies. He does not remember who he is or what happened. An investigator tries to find out if the man is suspect ...
